cupboard.summary: Can be used for lunch or for some yummy fajitas

cupboard.name: Bread
cupboard.summary: Bread is great, but cook it again and you get toast! Two for one I would say!

fridge.summary: Gotta have that butter for that bread (or some toast!)

fridge.name: Ham
fridge.summary: I don't like green egs but I do like ham

freezer.name: Sweet Potato Fries

freezer.name: Ice Cream
freezer.summary: Need a cry? Add some ice cream to the mix and it'll make most things better again
